Posts.Content: Hello, Best wishes. Apparently you are not aware that Budwig is a doctor as well. You can do a search. I pulled this up, but there are other things you can study. Dr Johanna Budwig diet Cancer, Arthritis, Multiple sclerosis, Psoriasis, Eczema, Acne, ... Flaxseed oil and cottage cheese Six time nobel award nominated doctor says this essential nutrient combination actually prevents and cures cancer! by Robert Willner, M.D.,Ph.D. (author of "The Cancer Solution"). I get no commissions and have no attachment to Dr. Budwig....I am simply passing on health information I have learned in my own searches. I have studied a lot for my own information and health. Best wishes, Cheryl
Posts.Title: help with information on hormone neg and her neg

Posts.Content: Here is a site with articles and links about cancer that may help you. http://www.shineonhealth.com/hoxsey.php You might have to copy and paste it into the address bar. Also, I read that Johanna Budwig successfully treated cancer with flax seed oil and cottage cheese. The Omega 3 in the flax seed oil and the Omega 6 in the cottage cheese helped increase the oxygen and cancer occurs in an oxygen poor environment so increasing the oxygen is a good thing. There are other things you can do. Jason Winters tea is a good tea to take and they have a website. Do a search. I hope this helps you. Cheryl
